                        lumped reaction, at least 5 steps - the details and stoichiometry has not yet been worked out,

                        1. thr addition with adenine phosphate dependent ligation
                        2. lys addition
                        3. polyketide x2 addition: 2 carbox acids followed by rounds of reduction
                        4. lysine addition - followed by ring closure
                        5. C18:1 addition
                        6. 2x hydroxylation
